import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
import java.io.PrintWriter;
import java.util.InputMismatchException;


class SubstringProblem {
	
	static char inp[],t[];
	
	public static void main(String args[]) {
		InputReader in = new InputReader(System.in);
		PrintWriter w = new PrintWriter(System.out);
			
		int tt = in.nextInt();
		
		while(tt-- > 0){
			int n = in.nextInt();
			StringBuilder hmm = new StringBuilder("");
			for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
				hmm.append(i);
			inp = hmm.toString().toCharArray();
			t = Integer.toString(in.nextInt()).toCharArray();
			int ans = 0;
			for(int i=0;i<inp.length;i++)
				if(match(i))
					ans++;
			w.println(ans);
		}

		w.close();
	}
	
	static public boolean match(int start){
		for(int i=0;i<t.length;i++)
			if(start + i >= inp.length ||inp[start + i] != t[i])
				return false;
		return true;
	}

	static class InputReader {

		private InputStream stream;
		private byte[] buf = new byte[8192];
		private int curChar;
		private int snumChars;
		private SpaceCharFilter filter;

		public InputReader(InputStream stream) {
			this.stream = stream;
		}

		public int snext() {
			if (snumChars == -1)
				throw new InputMismatchException();
			if (curChar >= snumChars) {
				curChar = 0;
				try {
					snumChars = stream.read(buf);
				} catch (IOException e) {
					throw new InputMismatchException();
				}
				if (snumChars <= 0)
					return -1;
			}
			return buf[curChar++];
		}

		public int nextInt() {
			int c = snext();
			while (isSpaceChar(c))
				c = snext();
			int sgn = 1;
			if (c == '-') {
				sgn = -1;
				c = snext();
			}

			int res = 0;

			do {
				if (c < '0' || c > '9')
					throw new InputMismatchException();
				res *= 10;
				res += c - '0';
				c = snext();
			} while (!isSpaceChar(c));

			return res * sgn;
		}
		
		public long nextLong() {
			int c = snext();
			while (isSpaceChar(c))
				c = snext();
			int sgn = 1;
			if (c == '-') {
				sgn = -1;
				c = snext();
			}

			long res = 0;

			do {
				if (c < '0' || c > '9')
					throw new InputMismatchException();
				res *= 10;
				res += c - '0';
				c = snext();
			} while (!isSpaceChar(c));

			return res * sgn;
		}
		
		public String readString() {
			int c = snext();
			while (isSpaceChar(c))
				c = snext();
			StringBuilder res = new StringBuilder();
			do {
				res.appendCodePoint(c);
				c = snext();
			} while (!isSpaceChar(c));
			return res.toString();
		}

		public boolean isSpaceChar(int c) {
			if (filter != null)
				return filter.isSpaceChar(c);
			return c == ' ' || c == '\n' || c == '\r' || c == '\t' || c == -1;
		}

		public interface SpaceCharFilter {
			public boolean isSpaceChar(int ch);
		}
	}

}
